result.html: Níl ionat ach girseach bheagYou're only a little girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ girseaċ ḃeagYou're only a little girl.

result.eng: I was born on a small farm.
result.html: Rugadh mé ar fheirm bheagI was born on a small farm.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ mé ar ḟeirm ḃeagI was born on a small farm.

result.html: Tá moill bheag ormI'm running late a little.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ḃeag ormI'm running late a little.

result.ga: Tá tú i do chónaí sa mBreatain Bheag

result.eng: The house is located in a small square, about two kilometres from the city centre.
result.ga: Tá an teach suite i gcearnóg bheag thart ar dhá chiliméadar ó lár na cathrach
result.orig: Tá an teach suite i gcearnóg bheag thart ar dhá chiliméadar ó lár na cathrach

result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ suite i gcearnóg ḃeag ṫart ar ḋá ċiliméadar ó lár na caṫraċThe house is located in a small square, about two kilometres from the city centre.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
